thread.title: After Five Years of Development, Quadrant Information Security Releases Sagan 1.0.0 Open Source Platform
thread.title_full: After Five Years of Development, Quadrant Information Security Releases Sagan 1.0.0 Open Source Platform

author: admin
title: After Five Years of Development, Quadrant Information Security Releases Sagan 1.0.0 Open Source Platform
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Quadrant Information Security 
JACKSONVILLE, Fla. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Quadrant Information Security has officially released their Sagan 1.0.0 open source platform after a five-year roadmap of development. 
Sagan works very similar to Intrusion Detection System (IDS) engines like Snort and Suricata. However, rather than analyzing network packets, Sagan analyzes “logs” for malicious activity. Due to Sagan's multi-threaded nature, the analysis, detection, and correlation is done in 100% real time. 
“Since June 2010 we have continued to set goals and milestones for our open source Sagan Technology, and after five years of development, we are thrilled to have exceeded the goals we set forth,” expressed Champ Clark III, chief technology officer at Quadrant Information Security. “This release offers more powerful features and stability to our community of users.” 
Champ Clark III and his team have been working hard to develop and support Sagan since 2010 in efforts to release the best open source (GNU/GPLv2) log analysis engine in the space. 
In addition to the open source platform, Quadrant Information Security utilizes this proprietary Sagan Technology with their commercial clients in conjunction with their 24/7 Security Operations Center (SOC) and MSSP offerings. 
Check out Sagan 1.0.0 at sagan.quadrantsec.com . 
About Quadrant Information Security 
Specializing in Enterprise Security consulting, Sagan Technology and Managed Security Services, Quadrant prides itself on delivering a holistic approach to help our customers maintain a secure environment. Our people + product approach delivers state of the art technologies with true security expertise. Learn more at quadrantsec.com .
